components.name: Wooden Slats
components.identification_logic: Standard wooden slats for bed frame, estimated based on typical mattress dimension requirements.
components.weight_reasoning: Each hardwood slat of dimensions 100cm x 5cm x 1cm has a volume of 0.005m³. Using an average hardwood density of 600kg/m³, the weight per slat is approximately 3kg. For 20 slats, the total weight is 1.5kg each.

components.name: Wooden Beam
components.identification_logic: Primary support structure for bed frame. Spruce is a common choice for its strength and cost-effectiveness in furniture construction.
components.weight_reasoning: The volume of the beam is 110cm x 5cm x 5cm = 0.0275 m³. Spruce wood has an average density of approximately 500 kg/m³, resulting in a weight of 0.0275 m³ x 500 kg/m³ = 1.375 kg per beam.

components.name: Wooden Post
components.identification_logic: Taller support posts for loft bed. Treated pine adds durability against wear and pests.
components.weight_reasoning: The dimensions of the wooden post are 178cm x 10cm x 10cm, which gives a volume of 0.178m x 0.1m x 0.1m = 0.00178m³. Treated pine has an average density of approximately 640 kg/m³, leading to a weight of about 1.139kg per post. For 4 posts, this results in a total estimated weight of approximately 4.556kg, or about 2.02kg per unit considering loss during treatment and machining.

components.name: Wooden Railing
components.identification_logic: Railing for safety on the lofted area. Maple is less prone to splintering for frequent human interaction.
components.weight_reasoning: The weight is estimated based on the volume of the wooden railing (0.208m x 0.03m x 0.03m = 0.00018672 m³) and the average density of maple wood (approximately 700 kg/m³). Thus, weight = volume x density = 0.00018672 m³ * 700 kg/m³.

components.name: Stair Rung
components.identification_logic: Rungs for climbing, Birch provides a good balance of hardness and comfort.
components.weight_reasoning: Birch wood has an approximate density of 680 kg/m³. The volume of the stair rung is 0.003 m³ (0.5m x 0.03m x 0.03m), leading to an estimated weight of 0.45 kg per piece.

components.name: Wooden Support Bracket
components.identification_logic: Additional support structures for stability. Hardwood plywood is sturdy yet lightweight.
components.weight_reasoning: Calculated weight based on the volume of hardwood plywood (20cm x 20cm x 2cm = 0.008 m³) with an average density of around 600 kg/m³.
